attachments.alt: Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden shelves, and built-in appliances including a dishwasher. Open concept living space with dining area and hardwood floors.

The image shows a modern and stylish open-plan living and dining area. The space features a gray sofa, a dining table with place settings, and a kitchen area with a dishwasher visible. The walls are a mix of white and wood paneling, creating a warm and in
Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden countertop, built-in Siemens microwave oven, various kitchen appliances and utensils, and open shelving with decorative items

Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, built-in appliances including a dishwasher, open shelving, and a marble-like countertop. The kitchen has a clean, minimalist design with a mix of wood and gray tones.
Modern bathroom with marble-like tile walls, a glass shower enclosure, a white vanity with a sink, and wooden storage cabinets. There are towels and a potted plant visible as well.
Spacious bedroom with a built-in wooden wardrobe, a large bed with gray bedding, and a decorative lamp on the nightstand. The room has a minimalist and modern design with a cozy atmosphere.
Gray sofa with patterned throw pillows, wooden shelving unit, coffee table, potted plant, and large window with curtains
Modern kitchen with dark gray cabinets, wooden shelves, and a dishwasher. The kitchen opens up to a living area with a TV stand and a dining table with chairs.

This image shows a modern and well-equipped gym space. The room features various fitness equipment such as treadmills, exercise bikes, and weight training machines. The walls are decorated with a green plant wall and a neon sign that says 'Rock your body'
Spacious living room with large sectional sofa, hanging chair, bookshelves, and a large mural wall. The room has track lighting, skylights, and a fireplace.
Spacious living room with large windows, hanging chairs, gray and pink armchairs, wooden shelves, and a large mural wall with illustrations of the city of Bern and surrounding areas.
Modern kitchen with wooden tables and benches, black pendant lights, and a wall mural that says 'In this kitchen we share cultures'
Dark room with comfortable gray sofas, large projection screen, and recessed lighting for a home theater setup

text.title: 2-Zimmerwohnung, 2. Stock mitte
text.description:
Die Liegenschaft befindet sich an zentraler und ruhiger Lage. Einkaufsm√∂glichkeiten und √∂ffentliche Verkehrsmittel befinden sich in unmittelbarer N√§he. Der Bahnhof ist in nur wenigen Fahrminuten erreichbar. Hunde- und Katzenhaltung ist nicht erlaubt.
Die Wohnung verf√ºgt √ºber eine K√ºche mit zeitgem√§ssem Komfort. Das Badezimmer wurde im Fr√ºhling 2018 saniert. Es sind Platten- und Laminatb√∂den verlegt. Ein Keller, ein Estrichabteil sowie ein franz√∂sischer Balkon geh√∂ren zu der Wohnung. Der Einbauschrank im Schlafzimmer bietet zus√§tzlichen Stauraum.

text.title: 2-Bedroom Apartment, 2nd Floor Central
text.description:
The property is located in a central and quiet area. Shopping facilities and public transport are in the immediate vicinity. The train station can be reached in just a few minutes by car. Keeping dogs and cats is not allowed.
The apartment has a kitchen with modern comfort. The bathroom was renovated in spring 2018. Plate and laminate floors are laid. A cellar, an attic compartment, and a French balcony belong to the apartment. The built-in wardrobe in the bedroom provides additional storage space.

text.title: Appartamento 2 camere, 2¬∞ piano in centro
text.description:
La propriet√† si trova in una zona centrale e tranquilla. I negozi e i mezzi di trasporto pubblici sono nelle immediate vicinanze. La stazione ferroviaria pu√≤ essere raggiunta in pochi minuti in auto. √à vietato tenere cani e gatti.
L'appartamento dispone di una cucina con comfort moderno. Il bagno √® stato ristrutturato nella primavera del 2018. Sono stati posati pavimenti in piastrelle e laminato. Una cantina, uno scomparto soffitta e un balcone francese appartengono all'appartamento. L'armadio a muro nella camera da letto offre uno spazio di archiviazione aggiuntivo.

text.title: Appartement 2 pi√®ces, 2e √©tage en centre
text.description:
La propri√©t√© est situ√©e dans un quartier central et calme. Les commerces et les transports en commun sont √† proximit√© imm√©diate. La gare peut √™tre atteinte en quelques minutes en voiture. Il est interdit de garder des chiens et des chats.
L'appartement dispose d'une cuisine avec confort moderne. La salle de bain a √©t√© r√©nov√©e au printemps 2018. Des sols en plaques et en stratifi√© sont pos√©s. Un cellar, un compartiment de grenier ainsi qu'un balcon fran√ßais appartiennent √† l'appartement. Le placard encastr√© dans la chambre √† coucher offre un espace de stockage suppl√©mentaire.

The image shows a modern and stylish open-plan living and dining area. The space features a gray sofa, a dining table with place settings, and a kitchen area with a dishwasher visible. The walls are painted in light colors, and the room has a mix of woode
Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden countertop, built-in Siemens microwave oven, various kitchen appliances and utensils, open shelving with decorative items

Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, built-in appliances including a dishwasher, open shelving, and a marble-like countertop. The kitchen has a clean, minimalist design with a mix of wood and gray tones.
Modern bathroom with marble-like tile walls, glass shower enclosure, vanity with white sink and wooden cabinets, towels, and a potted plant
Spacious bedroom with a built-in wooden wardrobe, a large bed with gray bedding, and a decorative lamp on the side table. The room has a minimalist and modern design with a cozy atmosphere.

Modern kitchen with dark cabinets, wooden accents, built-in dishwasher, and open view to the living area
Modern and open kitchen space with wooden tables and benches, black pendant lights, and a large wall text that says 'In this kitchen we share cultures'.
Dark, theater-style room with gray upholstered seating, wood flooring, and a projector screen or display at the front
